title: TestBasics and TestSpanExplanations branch5x failures
description:
I'm seeing these recent failures on branch 5x:

https://builds.apache.org/job/Lucene-Solr-Tests-5.x-Java7/3159/
https://builds.apache.org/job/Lucene-Solr-Tests-5.x-Java7/3158/

They reproduce on java 7, but not on java 8. I will try to track down at least which change started triggering the failures.

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.content: Both of these test failures are from LUCENE-6466.
